reminders: Send blessings upon the Prophet ﷺ
O Allah, send blessings, peace, and blessing upon our master Muhammad
O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad as many times as those who remember him
O Allah, send blessings and peace upon Your beloved Mustafa
O Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift in Reckoning, defeat the confederates. O Allah, defeat them and shake them
O Allah, suffice me with Your lawful against Your prohibited, and enrich me with Your bounty from needing others
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, from incapacity and laziness, from cowardice and stinginess, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men
O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You make difficulty easy if You wish
There is no servant who commits a sin, performs ablution well, then stands to pray two units of prayer, then seeks forgiveness from Allah, except that Allah forgives him
It is Allah's decree, and what He wills, He does
Whoever sends blessings upon me once, Allah sends blessings upon him tenfold
Do not take my grave as a place of celebration, but send blessings upon me, for your blessings reach me wherever you are
The miser is the one in whose presence I am mentioned and he does not send blessings upon me
Indeed, Allah has angels who roam the earth, conveying to me the greetings from my nation
No one sends greetings upon me except that Allah returns my soul to me so that I may return the greeting
Glory be to Allah and His praise, Glory be to Allah the Magnificent
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hellfire
There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent
Two phrases that are beloved to the Most Merciful: Glory be to Allah and His praise, Glory be to Allah the Magnificent
For me to say 'Glory be to Allah, and Praise be to Allah, and There is no deity but Allah, and Allah is Greater' is more beloved to me than all upon which the sun rises
Whoever says 'Glory be to Allah the Magnificent and His praise', a palm tree is planted for him in Paradise
O Abdullah bin Qais, shall I not guide you to a treasure from the treasures of Paradise? Say: There is no might nor power except with Allah
Glory be to Allah and His praise
I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him
O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You well
Allah is sufficient for me. There is no deity except Him; in Him I have placed my trust
O Allah, forgive me and have mercy on me
My Lord, expand for me my chest and ease for me my task
O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad
There is no deity except You, Glory be to You! Indeed, I have been among the wrongdoers
Glory be to Allah, and praise be to Allah, and there is no deity except Allah, and Allah is Greater
Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best Disposer of affairs
There is no might nor power except with Allah
O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being
Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire
Glory be to my Lord, the Magnificent
Glory be to my Lord, the Most High
O Allah, our Lord, to You belongs all praise
My Lord, increase me in knowledge
O Allah, bless my time for me
O Allah, open for me the gates of Your mercy
To Allah we belong and to Him we shall return
O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided
O Allah, inspire me to sensible conduct
O Allah, make our end good in all affairs
O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and acceptable deeds
O Allah, make me among Your righteous servants
O Allah, make the best of my life its end
I entrust you to Allah, whose trusts are never lost
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the strain of tribulation
enabledMessage: Reminder to send blessings upon the Prophet ﷺ has been enabled
disabledMessage: Reminder to send blessings upon the Prophet ﷺ has been disabled
